A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun and exciting film to add to the franchise\, it's few flaws are forgivable\, as the excellent character development drives the storyline. Many (many) laughs\, ridiculously cool special effects\, memorable fight scenes\, and some new concepts introduced. Great throwback puppeteering of new and old characters\, but blends easily with CG characters. This film shows the very human side of many characters\, their flaws exposed\, and raw emotion at times takes over\, muddling reason. Overall\, I can't wait to watch it again and catch all the details.
